thread.title: Live Devon traffic, weather and news on July 16 - Devon Live

author: Neil Shaw
title: Live Devon traffic, weather and news on July 16 - Devon Live

organizations.name: north devon link road share neil shaw head of digital

text:
News Live Cornwall traffic, weather and news on July 16 Our dedicated breaking news team will have their eyes on every major route in the South West, including the M5, A38, A30, A380, A390, A39 and North Devon Link Road Share Neil Shaw Head of Digital, live and trending for PlymouthLive, DevonLive and CornwallLive Updated (Image: Penny Cross / File Image) Share
Welcome to the breaking news service for Devon, Cornwall and Plymouth - the only place you can get all of region's latest news and traffic, travel and weather updates.
Our dedicated breaking news team will have their eyes on every major route in the South West, including the M5, A38, A30, A380, North Devon Link Road and across Plymouth and Exeter, as well as updates from GWR and South Western, and any news from the ferries and airports.
We'll keep you updated on everything that's happening on the roads - as well as all the developments during the day.
This is where you will hear first about all the breaking news in - from crime and traffic to major investigations and politics .
If there's a story we're missing then please email us , message us on Facebook or call our newsroom on 01752 293 100. 12:25 Fears for future of Debenhams 11:36 Police forced to intervene at community reassurance meeting ST AGNES Prince Charles' previous support for SAS
Hugo Tagholm ceo of SAS said: “In 2015 we hosted a ocean plastic awareness day at Fistral beach which Prince Charles attended. Today is a follow up event about the solution to ocean plastic.”
He added: “So much has changed since 2015. Now most businesses are aware of the issue. The government is acting on it. We’re delighted to be leading the international campaign against ocean plastic and working towards solutions to this huge problem.” 11:34 School to lose playing field 10:33 Cornish MP resigns his post over Brexit 09:31
